title: How Far Have We Really Gotten With Alternative Energy?
author: Jennifer Hiller; David Hodari
description: There's a lot of hype and confusion about carbon-free energy sources. Here's a look at five of them: how much they produce, what they cost, and what obstacles they face.
cleaned_text: We hear a lot about the need to move to cleaner forms of power from all sides—utilities, politicians, advocates and energy companies. There are all sorts of ideas on where we want to go, and how to get there. Copyright ©2023 Dow Jones & Company, Inc.
